12 Dec 2014

My top albums 2014

I love music and I love having the time to explore weird and wonderful new albums. Being a freelancer, music helps to keep me company, keeps me focused and lifts my mood.

According to my Last.fm profile, these are my top albums for 2014 (with Spotify links)…

  1. At Best Cuckold by Avi Buffalo
  2. This Is All Yours by Alt-J
  3. The Night Is Young by The 2 Bears
  4. The Scenic Route by Panacea
  5. Singles by Future Islands
  6. Wooden Aquarium by Mazes
  7. They Want My Soul by Spoon
  8. Our Love by Caribou
  9. Jungle by Jungle
  10. Keep Moving by Hyde & Beast
